xwikidoc.content: hierarchy.core.loading=Loading ... ## translations for the hierarchy macro ## hierarchy.updateparent.loading=Moving... hierarchy.updateparent.success=Document successfully moved: hierarchy.updateparent.to=to parent hierarchy.updateparent.error=Error moving document: hierarchy.updateparent.error.tooltip=The parent of this document is no longer synchronized. Reload the page to see the actual hierarchy. hierarchy.updateorder.error=An error occurred while updating the order of the child documents for hierarchy.updateorder.success=Successfully updated the order of the child documents for hierarchy.updateorder.loading=Saving the order of the child documents... hierarchy.updateorder.error.tooltip=The order of the child documents of this document is no longer synchronized. Reload the page to see the actual hierarchy. hierarchy.updateparentandorder.error.tooltip=The parent and order of child documents for this document are no longer synchronized. Reload the page to see the actual hierarchy.
